mapper.update: update user_modify_record set user_modify_type = #{userModifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modify_date = #{userModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_modify_before = #{userModifyBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modify_after = #{userModifyAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modufy_success = #{userModufySuccess,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_modify_type, user_modify_date, user_modify_before, user_modify_after, user_modufy_success from user_modify_record where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select user_id, user_modify_type, user_modify_date, user_modify_before, user_modify_after, user_modufy_success from user_modify_record
